title: Review: Ibis Ripley AF is a budget ripper â€“ actual weights, custom builds & more!
content:
The Ibis Ripley AF brings their playful performance to a budget-friendly mountain bike that sits somewhere between XC and trail. This new alloy version amplifies the fun factor a bit over the carbon Ripley, and proved that just because a frame or bike is affordable, it doesn’t mean ride quality is diminished. I received a […]
